scripts.clean: rm -rf ./.build && find ./ms-treeview -name "*.js" -type f -delete -o -name "*.d.ts" -type f -delete -o -name "*.js.map" -type f -delete && rm -f ms-treeview.js*
scripts.start: npm run build-demo && concurrently "npm run tsc:wd" "npm run lite"
scripts.build-demo: npm run build && cd demo && npm i && npm install ../ && cd .. && ln -fhs ../typings demo/typings && npm run tscd
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run typings && npm run tsc && node bundle.js && mkdir -p ./bundles && cp .build/ms-treeview.js ./bundles/ms-treeview.js
